    • createPost

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      success/fail message

    • updatePost

      @PutMapping(path="/posts/put/{id}") public Post updatePost​(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Post request)
      Updates an existing post
      Parameters:
      id - id of post
      request - new post object
      Returns:
      newly inserted post object

      success/fail message
